changes.description: CLI is now always interactive with all files pre-selected by default
Users can now deselect files instead of selecting them - all files are pre-selected
Simplified menu - removed non-interactive copy option
Fixed error when using boxen in global installation
Fixed Windows compatibility issue with NODE_OPTIONS in start script
Fixed async function handling
Visual progress bar showing copy progress in real-time
Estimated time remaining (ETA) during file copy operations
See how long the copy operation has been running
See which file is currently being copied
Select individual files to copy instead of copying all files
Filter files by type (e.g., only .js, .ts, .jsx, .tsx files)
Choose between copying current changes or comparing with main branch
Better visual feedback so you always know what's happening
Simplified menu - choose your copy mode directly when copying
Distinct icons for each menu option for easier navigation
All interface elements now in English
Clear on-screen instructions for selecting files
Version number displayed in welcome screen
Updated dependencies
Fixed duplicate title display in changelog animation
Fixed small issues
Full English translation of CLI interface and changelog
All user-facing messages and error messages translated to English
Animated changelog with cool animations added
Menu icons added for better user experience
Comprehensive tests for global installation added
Changelog path for global installation corrected

Improved code quality
More visually appealing CLI interface
Package files optimized for npm publish

9 new tests for global installation and cross-platform compatibility
Security adjustments
